sample: ... the acting was so bad I had to watch it again and again. All in all, this film is not a great horror film at all. The acting is good, but if you like scary movies with bad acting, don't bother watching this one. If you are looking for a good horror movie with good acting and lots of scares, stay away from this crap. You won't be disappointed. Don't waste your time or money on this.
... in the case of this movie it was a little bit better than I expected, but that's about it.
